original_title: Kayak: Merlin - Bard of the Unseen
overview: Recorded on 3rd of May 2003 in the Orpheus Theatre. Apeldoorn, The Netherlands. DVD 1 contains the complete rock opera Merlin - The Bard of the Unseen. DVD 2 contains the second part of the concert, performing their greatest hits. Pal/All Region/Includes making of 'Merlin'.
title: Kayak: Merlin - Bard of the Unseen
